meanings.definition: Belonging to or associated with you.
meanings.sent1: Yourn hat is on the table.
meanings.sent2: The book is yourn, not mine.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally wore yourn shoes to the party!
meanings.sent4: The yourn smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The yourn house had a cozy feel.

meanings.definition: Used to address or refer to the person or people being spoken or written to.
meanings.sent2: Yourn is on the top shelf.
meanings.sent3: Yourn always knows how to make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sound of yourn voice is soothing.
meanings.sent5: Yourn is the best at solving puzzles.
